title: Trump says U.S. will have enough Covid vaccine doses for all Americans by April
description: During a press briefing, President Trump said “hundreds of millions” of doses would be ready for widespread distribution by April. Health officials have said a vaccine wouldn’t be widely available until next summer.
source.name: NBC News

author: Shannon Pettypiece and Nicole Acevedo
title: Trump announces aid for Puerto Rico, infusing politics in an apparent play for Florida voters
description: Less than 50 days before an election where Florida’s Puerto Rican population could prove pivotal, President Donald Trump said he would be sending $13 billion in disaster aid there and had a plan to revive the country’s pharmaceutical manufacturing sector.
content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump announced Friday he is sending $13 billion in disaster aid to Puerto Rico, an unexpected move years after a hurricane devastated the island and 45 days before the el… [+4787 chars]
source.name: NBC News
